original_title: The New Testament Bible Stories for Children - Jesus Death & Resurrection
overview: The Bible comes alive in this delightful animated series. The videos in this series of the last days of Jesus leading to his crucifixion and the miracles that followed in a three disc video set plus a fourth disc containing a printable coloring book and 12 kids songs. The video discs are as follows; Disc 1 - The Last Supper, Disc 2 - Jesus on Trial & Disc 3 - Death & Resurrection
tagline: The New Testament Bible Stories for Children
title: The New Testament Bible Stories for Children - Jesus Death & Resurrection
